question: Who postulated a single contract to abandon the State of nature?
explanation:
According to Hobbes, Men abandoned the State of Nature and established a society and State together,
thus, through a single contract.
Hobbes held that contract was made by stating, “ I Authorize and gave up my rights of governing
myself to this man or this Assembly of men, on this, condition, that thou give up thy right to him
and authorize all his Actions in like manner”.
